title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the foundation of the power that the EPA exercised related to the Clean Water Act.

For Task A2, the response must explain how the EPA’s power can have an impact on civil liberties.

For Task B, the response must explain why a political appointee, such as the head of the EPA, might implement changes to the Clean Water Act differently than the civil servants who work within the EPA.

For Task C1, the response must describe an informal power the president could use to influence the EPA’s policies regarding the Clean Water Act.

For Task C2, the response must explain how the president’s statement might impact the actions of the EPA.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes any one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes five of the tasks set by the question.
